briefTitle: A Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Testosterone Gel
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Open-label, Non-randomized, Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of FE 999303 (Testosterone Gel) in Adult Hypogonadal Males
summary: This is a Phase 3 clinical trial in adult hypogonadal males with baseline serum testosterone concentrations \<300 ng/dL. The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of testosterone gel (2%) delivered using an applicator.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Percentage of Subjects on Day 90 Whose Cavg (0-24) Serum Total Testosterone Levels Are Between 300 and 1050 ng/dL
